element.name: Other Associated Symptoms
element.definition: Other symptoms identified by the patient or observed by EMS personnel.
element.v3Comment:
Code list is represented in ICD-10-CM. Reference the NEMSIS Suggested Lists at: https://nemsis.org/technical-resources/version-3/version-3-resource-repository/
ICD-10-CM
Website - http://uts.nlm.nih.gov
Product - UMLS Metathesaurus

asserts.assert: When Other Associated Symptoms has a Pertinent Negative of "Approximate", it should have a value and it should not have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting).
Possible Injury should be "Yes" when a symptom or impression is injury-related.
Other Associated Symptoms should only be recorded when Primary Symptom is recorded.
When Other Associated Symptoms has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When Other Associated Symptoms is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
